question: Question
checkResults: Now you can look back at the cards and leave a like if you enjoyed!
warningNoNameDeck: Give your deck a name to continue!
warningSameNameDeck: You already have a deck with this name!
challengeOthers: Here you can challenge yourself and other players in quiz games.
includesFunctionality: Flashcard now also includes functionality that lets you create your own decks of flashcards.

suggestAndVote: Suggest and vote on which deck to play with other players in lobby.
whenEveryoneReady: When everyone is ready to see the answer, the answer will show and thejn the quiz will proceed to the next card.
